author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the Tamil Nadu Government Employees Association staging a protest in Tiruchi on Tuesday.— Photo: A.Muralitharan

Over 500 government employees, noon-meal workers and road workers were arrested here on Tuesday after they squatted on the road in support of their demands.

The employees raised slogans in support of their demands and sat on the road near the St. John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School roundabout for sometime when they were picked up by the police.

Those arrested were released in the evening.

A section of government employees affiliated to the Tamil Nadu Government Employees Association have been staging protest demanding among others scrapping of new pension scheme, rectifying pay anomalies and filling of vacancies.
title: Government employees court arrest
